text: Na ba bandi babangikanyije (Allah) baravuze bati “Iyo Allah aza kubishaka, yaba twe cyangwa ababyeyi bacu, nta kindi twari kugaragira mu cyimbo cye, ndetse nta n’icyo twari kuziririza ataziririje we ubwe.” Uko ni na ko abababanjirije babigenje. None se hari ikindi intumwa zishinzwe kitari ugusohoza ubutumwa mu buryo bugaragara
